name: Elena Ortega
comingEvent: I’ll be speaking at OpenSouthCode on June 20 - 21, 2025 — see you there!

description.summary: Senior frontend engineer with over {{yearsOfExperience}} years of experience. Strong problem-solving skills and a keen eye for design.
details: Senior Frontend Engineer with over {{yearsOfExperience}} years' experience working in international projects, driving the digital transformation of clients across diverse industries.
Highly experienced in frontend development, with experience as full-stack and mobile developer.

Experience working in agile methodology within multicultural teams, in the client side and remotely. Contributing in all the project phases: planning, design of the solution, frontend tasks development, release to production and maintenance.
Recognized as a proactive and competent person, who likes challenges and continuous learning.
